text:
Moved from 1.5.1 to 1.5.2 and the following task does not work

<ear destfile="files/BEA_${ant.project.name}_1_0.ear" manifest="files/meta-
inf/manifest.mf" update="true"/> 

The manifest is put in but all the files in the ear were removed.

It worked in 1.5.1.
